BLAS, LAPACK and SCALAPACK

Basic linear algebraic packages

What is BLAS and LAPACK and SCALAPACK?

  • BLAS and LAPACK are basic packages for vector/matrix operations on single processor.
  • SCALAPACK extends a subset of LAPACK routines to distributed memory MIMD parallel computers.
